alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jefferson, northern Taylor and Madison Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Monticello to 17 miles west of Perry. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Pinetta, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Lovett, Hanson, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Goose Pasture, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Secotan and Boyd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
